attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Blair was democratically elected to PM (more's the pity) however, in a democracy how can Gordon Brown become PM without another General Election?  We the electorate did not vote him in. Actually I never vote labour anyway. Talk about the party of high taxation and stealth taxes. How can anyone afford to live in the UK anymore and as for the NHS they have stuffed it up totally.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
